title: Around the World in 80 Days
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A Victorian Englishman bets that with the new steamships and railways he can circumnavigate the globe in eighty days.

title: The Ten Commandments
description: Moses, an Egyptian Prince, learns of his true heritage as a Hebrew and his divine mission as the deliverer of his people.

title: Giant
description: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

title: The King and I
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: A widow accepts a job as a live-in governess to the King of Siam's children.

title: The Searchers
description: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches.

title: The Killing
description: A criminal mastermind recruits a group of men for one last racetrack heist, but things don't go according to plan.

title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
description: A small-town doctor learns that the population of his community is being replaced by emotionless alien duplicates.

title: Forbidden Planet
description: A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them has.

title: Written on the Wind
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: The alcoholic playboy son of a Texas oil tycoon and his sister are destroyed by their own demons and family conflicts.

title: Lust for Life
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: The life of the brilliant but tortured artist Vincent van Gogh.

title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
description: An American family on vacation in Morocco stumbles onto an assassination plot and the conspirators kidnap their son to ensure their silence.

title: War and Peace
description: Napoleon's tumultuous relations with Russia including his disastrous 1812 invasion serve as the backdrop for the tangled personal lives of two aristocratic families.

title: High Society
description: A spoiled heiress's wedding plans are complicated by the arrival of her ex-husband and a tabloid reporter.

title: The Bad Seed
description: A housewife suspects that her seemingly perfect eight-year-old daughter is a heartless killer.

title: Bus Stop
description: A naive but stubborn cowboy falls in love with a saloon singer and tries to take her away to his ranch.

title: Friendly Persuasion
description: A pacifist Quaker family's life is disrupted by the outbreak of the Civil War.

title: Moby Dick
description: The sole survivor of a lost whaling ship relates the tale of his captain's self-destructive obsession to hunt the white whale, Moby Dick.

title: The Rainmaker
description: A middle-aged spinster's life is forever changed by the arrival of a charismatic con man who claims he can make it rain.

title: Anastasia
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: An opportunistic Russian businessman attempts to pass a mysterious impostor as the Grand Duchess Anastasia.

title: The Teahouse of the August Moon
description: An American captain is sent to Okinawa to Americanize the village, but the villagers have other plans.

title: Trapeze
description: A crippled circus acrobat is tormented by his past and the arrival of a young man who wants to learn the triple somersault.

title: The Girl Can't Help It
description: A gangster hires a down-and-out press agent to make his blonde bombshell girlfriend a recording star.

title: Love Me Tender
description: A Confederate team is ordered to rob a Union train, but the war ends just before the robbery, leading to complications when they return home.

title: Carousel
description: A carnival barker returns from heaven to aid his wife and daughter.

title: Picnic
description: A drifter arrives in a small Kansas town and disrupts the lives of its citizens.

title: The Eddy Duchin Story
description: The tragic life of the popular 1930s pianist and bandleader Eddy Duchin.

title: The Solid Gold Cadillac
description: A small stockholder takes on the corrupt board of directors of a massive corporation.

title: Baby Doll
description: A child bride holds her husband at bay while a rival cotton gin owner tries to seduce her.

title: A Man Escaped
description: A French Resistance activist is imprisoned by the Nazis and devotes his waking hours to planning an elaborate escape.

title: Bob le Flambeur
description: An aging gambler plans a heist on the Deauville casino.

title: Aparajito
description: After living a while in Benares, 10-year old Apu and his mother move to a Bengali village where he excels at school.

title: The Burmese Harp
description: In the closing days of WWII, a Japanese soldier fails to get his countrymen to surrender to the overwhelming British forces and adopts the lifestyle of a Buddhist monk.

title: Early Spring
description: A salaried man, bored with his job and his wife, starts an affair with a fellow commuter.

title: Street of Shame
description: The personal lives of five prostitutes who work in a brothel in Tokyo's red-light district.

title: The Red Balloon
description: A young boy discovers a stray balloon, which seems to have a mind of its own, and they roam the streets of Paris together.
In a totalitarian future society, a man whose daily work is rewriting history tries to rebel by falling in love.

title: Bigger Than Life
description: A schoolteacher and family man's life spirals out of control when he becomes addicted to a cortisone drug prescribed for his illness.

title: Tea and Sympathy
description: A sensitive prep school student is harassed by his classmates for his perceived lack of manliness, but finds comfort with the housemaster's wife.

title: Somebody Up There Likes Me
description: The biography of Rocky Graziano, who rises from a life of crime to become the world middleweight boxing champion.

title: The Wrong Man
description: A musician is mistaken for an armed robber and his life unravels as he tries to prove his innocence.

title: Patterns
description: An ambitious young executive is brought in to replace an aging VP, leading to a corporate power struggle.

title: The Harder They Fall
description: A sportswriter becomes a press agent for a crooked boxing promoter who is fixing fights for an inept heavyweight.

title: Attack
description: A cowardly Captain in WWII is incompetent and dangerous, and his Lieutenant tries to get him removed before more men die.

title: 7 Men from Now
description: A former sheriff blames himself for his wife's death during a robbery and vows to track down and kill the seven men responsible.

title: Jubal
description: A rancher offers a desperate man a job, but the man's presence sparks jealousy and conflict on the ranch.

title: The Fastest Gun Alive
description: A mild-mannered storekeeper is forced to prove his speed with a gun when a notorious outlaw threatens his town.

title: Earth vs. the Flying Saucers
description: Extraterrestrials in flying saucers contact a scientist as part of a plan to enslave the inhabitants of Earth.

title: It Conquered the World
description: An alien creature from Venus secretly contacts a disillusioned scientist to help it take over the world.

title: Rodan
description: A giant prehistoric pteranodon hatches from an egg and terrorizes Japan.

title: Godzilla, King of the Monsters!
description: A giant, radioactive reptile emerges from the ocean to destroy Tokyo, while an American reporter covers the devastation.

title: Alexander the Great
description: The life and conquests of Alexander the Great, the King of Macedonia.

title: The Catered Affair
description: A taxi driver's wife insists on giving their daughter an expensive wedding, causing financial strain on the family.

title: While the City Sleeps
description: Reporters compete to catch a serial killer dubbed "The Lipstick Killer" in order to land a top job at a media conglomerate.

title: Beyond a Reasonable Doubt
description: A writer frames himself for a murder he didn't commit to expose the flaws in the justice system, but things go awry.

title: And God Created Woman
description: An 18-year-old orphan shakes up the quiet village of Saint-Tropez with her unbridled sexuality.
